title: Super Bowl Picks + Newsapalooza, Proof of Abs - Fantasy Football Podcast for 9/7
description:
Week 1 is here! The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, lots of important injury updates for Week 1, and Super Bowl picks from Andy, Mike, and Jason! Plus, don’t miss the new edition of “Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast -- Fantasy Football Podcast for September 7th, 2021.
  
 (04:05) - Super Bowl Predictions
 (08:40) - Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire
 (18:20) - NFL News
 (37:25) - Mailbag
 (37:45) - Start Cooper Kupp or Chase Claypool?
 (39:20) - FAAB Waiver Tips
 (42:55) - RB or WR in the Flex spot?
 (44:20) - Start/Sit Tool 
 (45:15) - Fantasy Trades
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
  
 Check out today's sponsors:

Plus, don’t miss the new edition of “Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast -- Fantasy Football Podcast for September 7th, 2021.
